title.rendered: Discussion held on Child sexual abuse and Trafficking

content.rendered: On 24th November, 2016 a movie show was conducted regarding “Child sexual abuse and Trafficking” at Kalikapur Sabuj Kunri Centre where all children participated. After the movie show a discussion session was organized where all participants had an opportunity to ask their questions freely regarding the issue. Stories were also shared to make them more aware of the problem. The children and parents gathered much knowledge about the issue after the movie was screened and wanted more such awareness programmes to be held on a regular basis.
